propertyInformationUpdates.title: Property Information Updates

overview.content: Keeping your property information up-to-date is crucial for effective property management. This guide covers how to update various aspects of your property details.

proTip.content: Set up monthly reminders to review and update property information to ensure accuracy.

propertyAmenities.title: Property Amenities
propertyAmenities.content: Managing property amenities helps prospective residents understand what your property offers.

important.title: Important Note
important.content: Always keep contact information current as it's used for emergency notifications.

photosDocuments.title: Photos & Documents
photosDocuments.content: Visual content helps residents and prospects better understand your property.

photoUpdates.title: Photo Updates
photoUpdates.content: Regular photo updates showcase your property's current condition and improvements.
